discourse_list.title: Transparency blog post - MakerDAO & Seb as best practices

content.content: Hi community, I want to bring to your attention a blog post from Arca, an asset management firm. It talks about transparency through reporting and uses MakerDAO as the main example for best practices in the space, especially @SebVentures’ dune analytics dashboard. ar.ca blog post - The Good, Bad, and Ugly of voluntary reporting and transparency It’s short and sweet, I hope you enjoy it.
